abstract.p: List of some upcoming benefit parties in New York

block.p: For Love of Theater JAN. 8 -- Lillias White, Brian d'Arcy James, Sherie Rene Scott and others will perform at the Plaza in a benefit for the Manhattan Theater Club's productions and educational programs. The evening will begin with drinks at 7, followed by dinner at 8 and the show at 9:15. Tickets, $400, from (212) 399-3000, ext. 146.

Party on Ice JAN. 10 -- The Ronald McDonald House in New York will benefit from a skating party at Rockefeller Center with members of the New York Rangers. The evening will begin at 5:45 with a cocktail reception and a buffet dinner. Tickets, $1,000, or $500 for admission at 6:30 for skating and the buffet, from (212) 245-6570.

Fiddler at the Museum JAN. 10 -- Itzhak Perlman will perform at a dinner at the American Museum of Natural History to raise money for Survivors of the Shoah Visual History Foundation. The organization videotapes and preserves the stories of Holocaust survivors for educational purposes and for use in documentary works. The evening will begin at 6:30 with a cocktail reception; dinner will follow at 8. Tickets, $1,500, from (212) 245-6570.
